DOC.brief_title: A Study Compare Pharmacokinetic Profile Two Paracetamol Formulations
DOC.criteria: Good general health ( opinion investigator ) clinically significant relevant abnormality medical history physical examination . Subject agree refrain alcohol consumption 10day period prior visit 2 throughout study . Participation another clinical study receipt investigational drug within 30 day screen visit . Current ( within 14 day screen ) regular use prescription , overthecounter drug include paracetamol/acetaminophen , herbal medicine drug know induce inhibit hepatic drug metabolism 30 day prior dose ( e.g . barbiturate , theophylline , cimetidine , erythromycin ) , exclude prescription birth control , applicable .
